about_the_game:
Take in the mysterious and exciting new melodies of the frigid Hinterlands with the Monster Hunter World: Iceborne Original Soundtrack

The 216+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
